messages.message: hello! I was curious how we share our FE PRs. Is there a designated slack channel where people post PRs and anyone can review, or do we just request certain reviewers based on who touched the code last?

I've been following something like this:
• If the PR is part of an ongoing project, I usually ask around and see if any frontend engineer would be able to help out reviewing all PRs related to the feature. Your manager can help pull in folks to review, too!
• If not, and if the PR is complicated/business-logic heavy, I'll tag the person who last touched the code
• Otherwise, I'll tag the person who last touched the code and the entire frontend team
